name: ETTIN

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ettin makes one Battleaxe attack and one Morningstar attack.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

raw_text:
